edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.asymmetricCrypto.encryption

Interface RSAOaepEnc

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AsymmetricEnc, Cca1, Cca2, Cpa, Eav, EncSecLevel, Indistinguishable, NonMalleable, SecurityLevel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BcRSAOaep, CryptoPPRSAOaep, OpenSSLRSAOaep, RSAOaepAbs

    public interface RSAOaepEnc
extends AsymmetricEnc, Cca2
    General interface for RSA OAEP encryption scheme. Every concrete implementation of RSA OAEP encryption should implement this interface. By definition, this encryption scheme is CCA-secure and NonMalleable.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.asymmetricCrypto.encryption.AsymmetricEnc

        decrypt, encrypt, encrypt, generateBytesFromPlaintext, generateCiphertext, generateKey, generateKey, generatePlaintext, getAlgorithmName, getMaxLengthOfByteArrayForPlaintext, getPublicKey, hasMaxByteArrayLengthForPlaintext, isKeySet, reconstructCiphertext, reconstructPrivateKey, reconstructPublicKey, setKey, setKey
